text: Make Poverty History is a British and Irish campaign that wants to stop people from being poor and to help richer people learn about the poor people of the World. The symbol of the campaign is a white "awareness wristband" made of cotton or silicone with the words written in dark black and the word 'poverty' written in light black (e.g.: 'MAKEPOVERTYHISTORY'). ==References== ==Other websites== *Make Poverty History (UK) *MAKEPOVERTYHISTORY(Republic of Ireland) *BBC News - About Make Poverty History Category:Poverty Category:Political organisations in the United Kingdom
title: Make Poverty History
